verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> drew near <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1448><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> for to hear <S%G191><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> murmured, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This man <S%G3778><s%> receiveth <S%G4327><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> eateth with <S%G4906><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> if <S%G2532><s%> he lose <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> doth not <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> that which is lost, <S%G622><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he hath found <S%G2147><s%> it, he layeth <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> shoulders, <S%G5606><s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he cometh <S%G2064><s%> home, <S%G3624><s%> he calleth together <S%G4779><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> neighbors, <S%G1069><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Rejoice with <S%G4796><s%> me; <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> likewise <S%G3779><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth, <S%G3340><s%> more than <S%G2228><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> just persons, <S%G1342><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pieces of silver, <S%G1406><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> she lose <S%G622><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> piece, <S%G1406><s%> doth not <S%G3780><s%> light <S%G681><s%> a candle, <S%G3088><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sweep <S%G4563><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> diligently <S%G1960><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3775><s%> she find <S%G2147><s%> it?

And <S%G2532><s%> when she hath found <S%G2147><s%> it, she calleth her friends and her neighbors together, <S%G4779><s%> <S%G5384><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1069><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rejoice with <S%G4796><s%> me; <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> piece <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost. <S%G622><s%>

Likewise, <S%G3779><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> there is <S%G1096><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth. <S%G3340><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons: <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> younger <S%G3501><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> portion <S%G3313><s%> of goods <S%G3776><s%> that falleth <S%G1911><s%> to me. And <S%G2532><s%> he divided <S%G1244><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> his living. <S%G979><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered all together, <S%G4863><s%> <S%G537><s%> and took his journey <S%G589><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country, <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> wasted <S%G1287><s%> his <S%G848><s%> substance <S%G3776><s%> with riotous <S%G811><s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had spent <S%G1159><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a mighty <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> land; <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be in want. <S%G5302><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> and joined <S%G2853><s%> himself to a <S%G1520><s%> citizen <S%G4177><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> country; <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he would fain <S%G1937><s%> have filled <S%G1072><s%> his <S%G848><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> husks <S%G2769><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> did eat: <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> How many <S%G4214><s%> hired servants <S%G3407><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> father's <S%G3962><s%> have bread enough and to spare, <S%G4052><s%> <S%G740><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

I will arise <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son: <S%G5207><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> hired servants. <S%G3407><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he arose, <S%G450><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> was yet a great way off, <S%G568><s%> <S%G2089><s%> <S%G3112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had compassion, <S%G4697><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ran, <S%G5143><s%> and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> neck, <S%G5137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kissed <S%G2705><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in thy sight, <S%G1799><s%> <S%G4675><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G848><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> Bring forth <S%G1627><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> best <S%G4413><s%> robe, <S%G4749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put it on <S%G1746><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1325><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet: <S%G4228><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> bring hither <S%G5342><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> and kill <S%G2380><s%> it; and <S%G2532><s%> let us eat, <S%G5315><s%> and be merry: <S%G2165><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again; <S%G326><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> lost, <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is found. <S%G2147><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they began <S%G756><s%> to be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field: <S%G68><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> music <S%G4858><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dancing. <S%G5525><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> servants, <S%G3816><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> meant. <S%G1498><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> is come; <S%G2240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> hath killed <S%G2380><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf, <S%G3448><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he hath received <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> safe and sound. <S%G5198><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he was angry, <S%G3710><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> go in: <S%G1525><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> came his father out, <S%G1831><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entreated <S%G3870><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to his father, <S%G3962><s%> Lo, <S%G2400><s%> these many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> do I serve <S%G1398><s%> thee, <S%G4671><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> transgressed <S%G3928><s%> I at any time <S%G3763><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> commandment: <S%G1785><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yet thou never <S%G3763><s%> gavest <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> a kid, <S%G2056><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might make merry <S%G2165><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> friends: <S%G5384><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as soon as <S%G3753><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was come, <S%G2064><s%> which hath devoured <S%G2719><s%> thy living <S%G979><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> harlots, <S%G4204><s%> thou hast killed <S%G2380><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf. <S%G3448><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that I have <S%G1699><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> thine. <S%G4674><s%>

It <S%G1161><s%> was meet <S%G1163><s%> that we should make merry, <S%G2165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be glad: <S%G5463><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again; <S%G326><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> lost, <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is found. <S%G2147><s%>
